examples: Okay, Link, protrude your tongue.

words.defineEn: extend out or project in space
words.defineVi: mở rộng ra hoặc dự án trong không gian

examples: The horn is a bony protrusion that actually looks like something in between a horn and a really long nose.

Every gustatory cell projects a thread-like protrusion of the cellular membrane called a gustatory hair, which runs down to a taste pore, a small hole in the stratified squamous epithelium covering the taste bud and the rest of the tongue.
You'll notice here that horns are single protrusions without any additional forking or branching.
They form stronger connections with each other than with other neurons and they develop more dendritic spines: protrusions that help neurons talk to each other.
And the keel-like protrusion on their sternums, where the flight muscles attach, shrinks or disappears, except in penguins, who repurpose their flight muscles and keels for swimming.
words.defineEn: the act of projecting out from something

words.defineEn: curving outward

examples: Just like that, the red soles were born.

I got feet with soles, but they're attached.
words.defineEn: the syllable naming the fifth (dominant) note of any musical scale in solmization
words.defineVi: âm tiết đặt tên cho nốt thứ năm (chiếm ưu thế) của bất kỳ thang âm nào trong solmization

examples: Many people find solace in spending time with loved ones.
When my friend was diagnosed with cancer, she found solace in talking to others who had gone through the same experience.
I sat beneath the persimmon tree, finding solace in its comforting shade.
John's family disowned him when they discovered he was born on the wrong side of the blanket, but he found solace and acceptance among friends who appreciated him for who he was.
I find solace in sitting by the river, listening to the soothing sounds of nature.
words.defineEn: the comfort you feel when consoled in times of disappointment
words.defineVi: sự thoải mái mà bạn cảm thấy khi được an ủi trong lúc thất vọng

examples: It's been years since we had that falling out, and even though we're on good terms now, I still feel like something is missing - I suppose it's true what they say, a broken friendship may be soldered but will never be sound.

The Ram is soldered to the motherboard under this enormous vapor chamber.

words.defineEn: an alloy (usually of lead and tin) used when melted to join two metal surfaces

words.defineEn: an act that is considered to be impolite or unacceptable

examples: The next stage of Stonehenge's turbulent history is just a solstice away.

words.defineEn: either of the two times of the year when the sun reaches its farthest or closest distance from the equator

examples: The problem is there’s not a lot of disinterested people in these situations, so you have to both be open to people pointing out disinformation while not getting played, and that’s another one of these tough balances.

examples: To dislodge its prize, the frog sucks its eyeballs back into its head.

yeah, you dismount!
